CustomField.formula: ( total_payment_received__c + total_discounts__c )- ( IF(OR(CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"1512"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3070"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3065"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3078"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"1884"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"1893"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3304")), 299, IF(CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"1735"), 399, IF(OR(CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3368"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3108"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3133")),199,499))) * PAX_Travelling__c )
CustomField.label: POM Credit Amount
